definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: turning back, apostasy;—abs. [[מְשֻׁבָה]] Je 3:6 +; cstr. [[מְשׁוּבַת]] Pr 1:32; sf. [[מְשׁוּבָתָם]] Ho 14:5; pl. sf. [[מְשׁוּבׂתֵיכֶם]] Je 3:22, etc.;—backturning, apostasy, of Isr., Ho 14:5, [[מְשׁוּבָתִי]] Ho 11:7 apostasy from me (si vera l.); of Judah Je 2:19; Je 3:22, Je 5:6, Je 8:5, Je 14:7 (all pl.) + Ez 37:33 (read [[מְשׁוּבׂתֵיהֶם]] for ´[[מוֹשְׁ]]:, LXX Comm.); [[נִחַחַת]] ´[[מ]]: Je 8:5 enduring, perpetual apostasy; also as n. concr., appos. of foll. word, ´[[מְשֻׁבָה יִשׂ]]: Je 3:6, Je 3:8, Je 3:11, Je 3:12 apostate one, Israel. Of individual, [[מְשׁוּבַת]] [[פְּתָיִם]] Pr 1:32.
